traits.abilities: is hardy, hale, and healthy, but is clumsy and fumbling

personality.mannerism: Constantly reminds the person speaking to them that their child is a strong adventurer too
personality.interaction: is keeping a secret from the Party

voice.vocals: Speaks Normally, at a Normal pitch.
voice.quirk: repeats the last few words of a sentence/thought ('nice to meet you, meet you.')
